text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem SHINNYQuestionnaires

This case-sensitive code system http://shinny.org/us/ny/hrsn/CodeSystem/SHINNYQuestionnaires defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
asssessment-approval-questionnaire Patient approval to move forward with completing the assessment.
assessment-outreach-questionnaire Information regarding the patient outreach from the SCN for a patient assessment.
administrative-questionnaire Administrative questions that capture information about the patient's population categorization, specific services needed and/or medical necessities.
service-duplication-questionnaire Indicator questions recording whether the patient receives assistance from a variety of programs, as well as other social and healthcare needs.
referral-approval-questionnaire Patient approval to move forward with the referral.
hrsn-outreach-questionnaire Captures the service provider outreach date.
scn-outreach-questionnaire Captures the service provider outreach date.
patient-assessment-approval Patient approval to move forward with completing the assessment.
patient-assessment-outreach-date Date that a patient first receives outreach from SCN for assessment follow-up.
patient-assessment-outreach-status What was the final result of the patient assessment outreach? Did the patient get assessed? No response?
enhanced-pupulation-check Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, resulting in SCN request to update covered population categorization with MCO.
service-duplication-check Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives services that would inhibit ability to deliver any or all NYHER services.
clinical-criteria-check Check populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient has the required medical necessity that would satisfy requirement to deliver NYHER service.
housing-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives or is on any housing waitlists (e.g., HUD. Section 8, local housing authority, or other voucher programs).
nutritional-education-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives nutritional counseling or education.
nutritional-services-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is actively engaged in a nutrition program.
food-service-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently receives any home-delivered meals or food services.
snapp-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in SNAP.
wic-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in WIC.
tanf-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in TANF.
transportation-program Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently engaged in Transportation services.
medication-requiring-refrigeration Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is currently prescribed medication, requiring refrigeration for the management of a chronic condition.
breast-milk-requiriing-refrigeration Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient is a pregnant/postpartum persons that require a refrigeration for breast milk.
#adls-iadls Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient currently has Activities of Daily Living (ADLs) & Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADLs) needs.
medical-respite Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient meets the qualifications for medical respite (see notes).
childcare-assistance Indicator, populated by entity, conducting the assessment. Captures patient response during the HRSN assessment, identifying if patient needs assistance with childcare.
patient-referral-approval Patient approval to move forward with the referral.
hrsn-referral-outreach-date The date/time the HRSN Service Provider conducted outreach to patient, based on accepted referral.
scn-referral-outreach-date The date/time the SCN conducted outreach to the patient, based on referral if outreach is not initiated by HRSN Service Provider/Social Service Provider.
medicaid-high-utilizer Medicaid High Utilizer
nys-health-home Individuals Enrolled in a NYS Health Home
substance-use-disorders Individuals with Substance Use Disorders
pregnant-postpartum Pregnant and Postpartum Persons
children-chronic-condition Children Under 18 Years Old with a Chronic Condition
intellectual-developmental-disabiity Individuals with an Intellectual or Developmental Disability
serious-mental-illness Individuals with Serious Mental Illness
released-chronic-condition Individuals with a Chronic Condition Released from Incarceration in the Past 90 Days
high-risk-under-six-years High-Risk Children Under 6 Years Old
children-alternative-care Juvenile Justice-Involved, Foster Care Youth and Those Under Kinship Care
supportive-housing Supportive Housing
healthy-homes Healthy Homes
nutritional-counseling Nutritional Counseling
medical-tailored-meals Medically Tailored Meals (MTM) In-lieu of Services (ILOS)
health-home-enrollment Health Home Enrollment (under Enhanced Populations)
opwdd-waiver Office for Persons with Developmental Disabilities (OPWDD) Waiver
tbi-waiver Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI) Waiver
nhtd-waiver Nursing Home Transition Diversion (NHTD) Waiver
childrens-waiver Children’s Waiver
medicaid-advantage-program Medicaid Advantage Program (MAP)
mltcp Partial Capitation Managed Long-Term Care (MLTCP)
chronic-condition Chronic Condition
uncontrolled-asthma Uncontrolled Asthma
nutrition-therapy Enteral or Parenteral Nutrition Therapy
current-institutional-setting Currently in an Institutional Setting
heat-related-illness Heat-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit
cold-related-illness Cold-Related Illness Requiring an ER or UC Visit
thermoregulation-interference Conditions and Medications Interfering with Thermoregulation
